name: The Right Color (Frosfector Studios)
description:
The Right Color is a simple game of clicks for you to hit the color you ask for. The objective of the game is to return the color you started and each time you return to the initial color you count 1 point.

DONATE: https://www.paypal.com/donate/?token=wzTYVkA8E-K-cDW4A3pP2pSPvuH0FgZCth4evJ5dAlB...
